results.title: Innamorati
results.brief_description:
Assembled from family photographs, home movies and background music, Roberta Ciabarra narrates a poignant story of her parents courtship and unusual marriage as they migrate separately to Australia to establish a new life.

First created as part of the 3 day digital storytelling workshop conducted at Cinemedia by Nina Mullen and Joe Lambert from the Center of Digital Storytelling, Berkeley, CA.

group.title: Selected works from the digital storytelling program: April 2001

results.title: [Musterrolle: a compilation of short films by Peter Tscherkassky]
results.brief_description: 15 titles create this retrospective of experimental shorts by Austrian filmmaker Peter Tscherkassky. Titles date from 1981 through to the 1999 trailer for the Viennese Film Festival - Viennale. The films work through an experimentation with dissolves, double exposures, the ambiguity of light, found footage and the looping of vision and sound. Sound features heavily in Tscherkassky’s work and the principal composer here is Armin Schminkl. Schminkl also features as a subject for several films in the retrospective. Titles are as follows: Outerspace; The Arrival (L’Arrivee); Happy End; Parallel Space: interview; Tabula Rasa; Shot-Countershot; Kelimba; Manufraktur; Motion Picture; Urlaubsfilm; Freeze Frame; Liebesfilm; Erotique; Aderlab; Get Ready - Viennale ‘99 Trailer.
results.title_for_label: [Musterrolle: a compilation of short films by Peter Tscherkassky]
results.description: 15 titles create this retrospective of experimental shorts by Austrian filmmaker Peter Tscherkassky. Sound features heavily in Tscherkassky’s work and the principal composer here is Armin Schminkl. Schminkl also features as a subject for several films in the retrospective. Titles are as follows: Outerspace; The Arrival (L’Arrivee); Happy End; Parallel Space: interview; Tabula Rasa; Shot-Countershot; Kelimba; Manufraktur; Motion Picture; Urlaubsfilm; Freeze Frame; Liebesfilm; Erotique; Aderlab; Get Ready - Viennale ‘99 Trailer.
